x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/eventdefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/EventDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"EventDefinition","id":"07f51f9f-c2a1-4499-9b82-69fd59e2fb3e","status":"draft","purpose":"Monitor all admissions to Emergency","trigger":[{"type":"named-event","name":"monitor-emergency-admissions","data":[{"type":"Encounter"}],"condition":{"description":"Encounter Location = emergency (active/completed encounters, current or previous)","language":"text/fhirpath","expression":"(this | %previous).location.where(location = 'Location/emergency' and status in {'active', 'completed'}).exists()"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:16.010+08:00"}}'
